name: DeserializingObject

constructors.name: DeserializingObject

methods.name: getObjectFunction
methods.documentation:
Returns the memoized deserialization function used to deserialize the payload. This method is protected for use
 in subclasses.

methods.name: getPayload
methods.documentation:
Returns the deserialized payload using the default target type ({@code Object.class}). The result is cached and
 reused on subsequent calls.

methods.name: getPayloadAs
getPayloadClass
getRevision
methods.documentation: Returns the revision number of the serialized payload, if available.

methods.name: getType
methods.documentation: Returns the declared type of the payload (e.g., fully qualified class name), or {@code null} if unknown.

methods.name: isDeserialized
methods.documentation: Returns {@code true} if the payload has already been deserialized using the default type.
